name: Cherry Grab
description:
Overview:

The player has turned into a fox under mysterious circumstances. In order to be restored back to their human form, they must collect cherries that are scattered throughout difficult terrains and bring them to the wizard's house.

Cherry grab is a magical 2D platform games where players maneuver through different terrains while collecting cherries to bring to a wizard's house. As the levels gradually get harder and harder, players will use the skills they've learned in previous levels to assist them in overcoming obstacles that will prevent them from returning back to their original form.

Do you have what it takes to collect those cherries and save yourself? Play to find out!

Controls:

Arrow keys or WASD to move sideways

Spacebar to jump or wall climb

Credits:

Level and User Interface Design: Ashley Liu 

Assets Used: Sunny Land Asset Pack by Ansimuz 

Game Mechanics: Michael Baker
